item.title: Report E-2023080559
item.description:
Report E-2023080559

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-02T06:14:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XWO experienced a release from a 2950-pound battery. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 2-gallons of battery acid released impacting multiple areas of concrete to include a 10' x 10' and 20' x 10' areas, a 40' x 1' area of the ramp and a 5' x 5' area where the battery was sitting. The battery tipped over in transit causing 6 of the caps to be lost, resulting in a release. Terminal personnel removed the battery from the trailer to a dock area, which resulted in acid being released to multiple areas. The crew worked the absorbents deployed by XPO into the impacted areas and collected them into drums. The areas were then neutralized with sodium bicarb. All impacted absorbents and cleanup debris were placed into (2) 55-gallon poly drums. The damaged battery was up righted and secured to a new pallet, with poly sheeting taped over it to prevent further release. All waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023080339
item.description:
Report X-2023080339

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-27
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DAMAGED HAZMAT WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD. DURING INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED INNER PACKAGE WAS LEAKING. PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP. PACKAGE WAS THEN PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS.
